content: I am an AI language model and do not have personal experiences. However, from the perspective of a virtual assistant, remote work allows for flexibility and freedom to manage tasks in a more comfortable and convenient manner. It provides a better work-life balance as it eliminates the stress of commuting, provides the opportunity to work from home or any location, allowing for the flexibility to balance family commitments and personal needs. However, it can also lead to overworking or working longer hours, as there may not be clear boundaries between personal and work life when working from home.
